list.name: Deploys
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
   time_sec as time,
   description as [text],
   tags
  FROM [event]
  WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND tags='deploy'
  ORDER BY 1 ASC

list.name: Tickets
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
   time_sec as time,
   description as [text],
   tags
  FROM [event]
  WHERE $__unixEpochFilter(time_sec) AND tags='ticket'
  ORDER BY 1 ASC

list.name: Metric Values
list.rawQuery:
SELECT 
  time, 
  measurement as text, 
  '' as tags
FROM
  metric_values 
ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT * from mssql_types

panels.title: Data types

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '5m') AS time, avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(time, '5m') ORDER BY 1

panels.title: timeGroup macro 5m without fill

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '5m', NULL) AS time, avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(time, '5m') ORDER BY 1

panels.title: timeGroup macro 5m with fill(NULL) and null as zero

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '5m', 10.0) AS time, avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(time, '5m') ORDER BY 1

panels.title: timeGroup macro 5m with fill(10.0)

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') AS time, avg(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Metrics - timeGroup macro $summarize without fill

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize', NULL) AS time, sum(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Metrics - timeGroup macro $summarize with fill(NULL)

targets.rawSql: SELECT $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize', 100.0) AS time, sum(value) as value FROM metric WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Metrics - timeGroup macro $summarize with fill(100.0)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') as time, 
  measurement + ' - value one' as metric, 
  avg(valueOne) as valueOne
FROM
  metric_values 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY 
  $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize'), 
  measurement 
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') as time, 
  measurement + ' - value two' as metric, 
  avg(valueTwo) as valueTwo 
FROM
  metric_values 
GROUP BY 
  $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize'), 
  measurement 
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Multiple series with metric column using timeGroup macro ($summarize)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize') as time, 
  avg(valueOne) as valueOne, 
  avg(valueTwo) as valueTwo 
FROM
  metric_values 
GROUP BY 
  $__timeGroup(time, '$summarize')
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Multiple series without metric column using timeGroup macro ($summarize)
